synopsis.text: When the past and present collide, Shogo finds himself entangled in a web of emotions and memories. Once in love with Kanata, who is now a successful idol, Shogo is currently in a relationship with Neo. But when Kanata reappears, Shogo's feelings are put to the test as he grapples with his past and present relationships. Meanwhile, in the same town, Inori eagerly awaits the annual fireworks festival, a special event she promised to attend with her boyfriend, Isshu. But when Isshu's work keeps him away, Inori embarks on a nostalgic journey alone, recalling their shared memories and hoping for a reunion. As these interconnected stories unfold, characters navigate the complexities of love, commitment, and the power of memories. Will Shogo make a choice between Neo and Kanata, and will Inori and Isshu's paths cross once again at their cherished location? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
